name: sdm
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing StrongDM cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`sdm` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/strongdm/terraform-provider-sdm).

apiAccessKey.description: A GUID identifying the API key used to authenticate with the StrongDM API.

apiSecretKey.description: A base64 encoded secret key used to authenticate with the StrongDM API.

host.description: The host and port of the StrongDM API endpoint.

retryRateLimitErrors.description: Whether experienced rate limits should cause the client to sleep instead of erroring out

name.description: Unique human-readable name of the Service.

tags.description: Tags is a map of key, value pairs.

email.description: The User's email address. Must be unique.

tags.description: Tags is a map of key, value pairs.

bindAddress.description: The hostname/port tuple which the gateway daemon will bind to. If not provided on create, set to "0.0.0.0:listen_address_port".

gatewayFilter.description: GatewayFilter can be used to restrict the peering between relays and gateways.

listenAddress.description: The public hostname/port tuple at which the gateway will be accessible to clients.

name.description: Unique human-readable name of the Relay. Node names must include only letters, numbers, and hyphens (no spaces, underscores, or other special characters). Generated if not provided on create.

tags.description: Tags is a map of key, value pairs.

gatewayFilter.description: GatewayFilter can be used to restrict the peering between relays and gateways.

name.description: Unique human-readable name of the Relay. Node names must include only letters, numbers, and hyphens (no spaces, underscores, or other special characters). Generated if not provided on create.

tags.description: Tags is a map of key, value pairs.

egressFilter.description: A filter applied to the routing logic to pin datasource to nodes.

healthcheckNamespace.description: The path used to check the health of your connection.  Defaults to `default`.  This field is required, and is only marked as optional for backwards compatibility.

name.description: Unique human-readable name of the Resource.

secretStoreId.description: ID of the secret store containing credentials for this resource, if any.

egressFilter.description: A filter applied to the routing logic to pin datasource to nodes.

provider.description:
The provider type for the sdm package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

apiAccessKey.description: A GUID identifying the API key used to authenticate with the StrongDM API.

apiSecretKey.description: A base64 encoded secret key used to authenticate with the StrongDM API.

host.description: The host and port of the StrongDM API endpoint.

retryRateLimitErrors.description: Whether experienced rate limits should cause the client to sleep instead of erroring out

apiAccessKey.description: A GUID identifying the API key used to authenticate with the StrongDM API.

apiSecretKey.description: A base64 encoded secret key used to authenticate with the StrongDM API.

host.description: The host and port of the StrongDM API endpoint.

retryRateLimitErrors.description: Whether experienced rate limits should cause the client to sleep instead of erroring out

sdm:index/account:Account.description:
## Import

Account can be imported using the id, e.g.,

```sh
 $ pulumi import sdm:index/account:Account example a-12345678
```

service.description:
A Service is a service account that can connect to resources they are granted directly, or granted via roles. Services
are typically automated jobs.

user.description: A User can connect to resources they are granted directly, or granted via roles.

service.description:
A Service is a service account that can connect to resources they are granted directly, or granted via roles. Services
are typically automated jobs.

user.description: A User can connect to resources they are granted directly, or granted via roles.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Account resources.

service.description:
A Service is a service account that can connect to resources they are granted directly, or granted via roles. Services
are typically automated jobs.

user.description: A User can connect to resources they are granted directly, or granted via roles.

sdm:index/secretStore:SecretStore.description:

```sh
 $ pulumi import sdm:index/secretStore:SecretStore example se-12345678
```

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering SecretStore resources.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getAccount.

email.description: The User's email address. Must be unique.

name.description: Unique human-readable name of the Service.

tags.description: Tags is a map of key, value pairs.

type.description: a filter to select all items of a certain subtype. See the [filter documentation](https://www.strongdm.com/docs/automation/getting-started/filters for more information.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getAccount.

accounts.description:
A single element list containing a map, where each key lists one of the following objects:
* service:

email.description: The User's email address. Must be unique.

ids.description: a list of strings of ids of data sources that match the given arguments.

name.description: Unique human-readable name of the Service.

tags.description: Tags is a map of key, value pairs.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getAccountAttachment.

accountId.description: The id of the account of this AccountAttachment.

roleId.description: The id of the attached role of this AccountAttachment.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getAccountAttachment.

accountAttachments.description: A list where each element has the following attributes:

accountId.description: The id of the account of this AccountAttachment.

ids.description: a list of strings of ids of data sources that match the given arguments.

roleId.description: The id of the attached role of this AccountAttachment.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getAccountGrant.

accountId.description: The account id of this AccountGrant.

resourceId.description: The resource id of this AccountGrant.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getAccountGrant.

accountGrants.description: A list where each element has the following attributes:

accountId.description: The account id of this AccountGrant.

ids.description: a list of strings of ids of data sources that match the given arguments.

resourceId.description: The resource id of this AccountGrant.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getNode.

bindAddress.description: The hostname/port tuple which the gateway daemon will bind to. If not provided on create, set to "0.0.0.0:listen_address_port".

listenAddress.description: The public hostname/port tuple at which the gateway will be accessible to clients.

name.description: Unique human-readable name of the Relay. Node names must include only letters, numbers, and hyphens (no spaces, underscores, or other special characters). Generated if not provided on create.

tags.description: Tags is a map of key, value pairs.

type.description: a filter to select all items of a certain subtype. See the [filter documentation](https://www.strongdm.com/docs/automation/getting-started/filters for more information.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getNode.

bindAddress.description: The hostname/port tuple which the gateway daemon will bind to. If not provided on create, set to "0.0.0.0:listen_address_port".

ids.description: a list of strings of ids of data sources that match the given arguments.

listenAddress.description: The public hostname/port tuple at which the gateway will be accessible to clients.

sdm:index/getSecretStore:getSecretStore.description:
A SecretStore is a server where resource secrets (passwords, keys) are stored.
 Coming soon support for HashiCorp Vault and AWS Secret Store. Contact support@strongdm.com to request access to the beta.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getSecretStore.

name.description: Unique human-readable name of the SecretStore.
